SEARCH
Module banking.project3
Package banking.project3

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
banking.project3.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Manages an array-based database of various types of accounts. The database can grow dynamically and supports basic operations like open, close, deposit, and withdraw.
Author:
Zain Zulfiqar, Nicholas Yim

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Finds the index of a given account in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find.
      Returns:
      The index of the account, or NOT_FOUND if not found.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the capacity of the account database by a fixed increment.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Checks if an account exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists, false otherwise.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Checking checking)
      Checks if an Checking account exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      checking - The checking account to check.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists, false otherwise.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Opens a new account and adds it to the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to open.
      Returns:
      true if the account was successfully opened, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Closes an existing account and removes it from the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to close.
      Returns:
      true if the account was successfully closed, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Withdraws an amount from an existing account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account from which to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • selectionSortAccountType

      public void selectionSortAccountType()
      Sorts the accounts array based on the account type using the Selection Sort algorithm.

    • findForTransactions

      private int findForTransactions(Account account)
      Finds the index of an account that matches the given account for transactions.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find.
      Returns:
      The index of the matching account, or NOT_FOUND if not found.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Deposits the balance into the account if it exists.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to deposit into.

    • containsForTransactions

      public boolean containsForTransactions(Account account)
      Checks if account is contained for transactions
      Parameters:
      account - to be found
      Returns:
      true if contained, false if not
